divs: Sighting Details Well there has been a few sightings the one listedabove was the most dramatic. Like Billy Meirs ship disc with 3 bulbs on thebottom all different colors. From my perspective it just appeared thendissapeared.Also at same local saw a ball of plazma and many other things.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Arcata
There were no other sightings in Arcata on or around January 31st 1992
